body.name: Larinest Air Fryer 8Qt Plus Oilless 8-in-1 Family Size AirFryer,Easy Viewing Window and Fast Healthy cooking,Dishwasher-Safe Basket,Digital Touchscreen,Quiet, AF701, Black
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 2 hrs 25 mins
features: MULTIFUNCTIONAL AIR FRYER: With 8 QT capacity and 1800W power, Larinest air fryer provides generous cooking space, saving your time and effort.AF701 is equipped with a high-definition touch screen, controlled internal light and large clear viewing window,they are designed to be the perfect assistant for your cooking and decoration of your kitchen counter.

WIDE TEMPERATURE RANGE: 1800 watts of power and Dual heating elements at the top and bottom provide faster cooking speeds for you. To meet the needs of different foods and cooking functions, the air fryer temperature range is 90°F-400°F, allowing you to achieve the desired level of crispiness and browning.

FAMILY SIZE CAPACITY: Designed for 4-6 people, our Large Air Fryer gets dinner ready swiftly. The 8-quart internal capacity of this air fryer provides ample space to cook larger batches of food, making it suitable for families or gatherings.Perfect for those busy evenings when time is of the essence.

Dishwasher-Safe:The basket is made of nonstick coating.The removable,nonstick, dishwasher-safe easy-clean crisper basket simplifies cleanup, making it effortless to maintain the appliance's cleanliness.

VERSATILE COOKING OPTIONS: With 8 cooking functions including Air Fry, Roast, Broil, Bake, Reheat, Keep Warm, Pizza and Dehydrate, our air fryer offers versatility and allows you to prepare a wide range of dishes.It can replace a variety of kitchen appliances such as a toaster, rotisserie, fruit dryer, oven, etc., perfect for families who pursue a healthy diet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good value for money!
reviews.reviewText: The goods where packed very well when I received it. The capacity is perfect for my family. Actually this is my first time using air fryers, but everything seems so simple. Easy to cook and easy to clean! It heats up fast and gets food cooked well in a decent amount of time. I’ve used it several times, and now I have to say my kitchen can’t work without it. Overall I’m super pleased with this shopping!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Large size handles dinner with no problem.
reviews.reviewText: I have a smaller 4-quart air fryer and I really do like it a lot. It's great for heating things up quickly and cooking smaller portions. Sometimes, though, I would have to run it twice in order to fix enough for both my husband and me. This new 8-quart air fryer eliminates the need to run two batches through. It has already eliminated extra time in the kitchen for me (hooray!) and I'm able to do larger items as well. This week I cooked a whole chicken, and it came out looking good enough to be featured in an advertisement. Wish I would have taken a picture of it.The touch controls are very easy to figure out and operate. When the cooking is done, it is also very easy to clean. I wash dishes by hand. This cleans quickly and easily. I really love this machine and certainly recommend it if you are looking to fix larger meals.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Huge air fryer
reviews.reviewText: This is one very huge air fryer, it's my first one so I don't know much about them. The capacity is just so big and I find it very useful. My family is small but it can do a good portion for us that would last 2 days.It has a sleek design, it's touchpad so I would suggest being very careful where you're storing it and that nothing goes on top of it. It's not that loud, runs quiet (for us, anyhow) and seems to do a good job at cooking. I think it takes a little longer with some recipes but honestly it's supposed to reduce the energy we use so I plan on using it alone on some days and then other days use my oven/stove.It comes with a nice booklet that gives great instructions and tips. It's super easy to wash the basket and clean the grill plate. The timer function works well and there are lots of settings that are available. I haven't used them all yet. For my first one, I am very happy with it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lots of Space
reviews.reviewText: I love the size of this air fryer. It is easy to fit enough for all 4 people in my family in here at the same time. That is a huge time saver. I have had quite a few air fryers and have learned that I don’t like the ones that have doors, as they are hard to use and even harder to clean. I don’t want something small because it is so limiting and takes a lot of extra time to do things twice. This style with the large pull-out basket is the best. I like the rack that they include to raise your food up off the bottom of the basket, it keeps it out of any drippings that may occur during cooking. It cooks quickly and evenly, is easy to clean and is very easy to use. Thus far I have zero complaints and absolutely love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fast, easy and convenient
reviews.reviewText: Whip up dinner quick with this 8qt air fryer. It's large enough for fily meals and small enough to not take up a lot of counter space. Large selection of pre installed food times and temps.Eliminate oil and stay healthy air frying.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Esta freidora de aire es exelente producto, aparte que es grande y se puede hacer cualquier comida es digital muy buena tecnología y práctica estoy complacido
